job.title: Data Scientist (Deep Learning Expert)
job.description: pWe have an opportunity available for Data Scientist  Deep Learning to join our team Our team works directly with scientists to develop software platforms that enable cuttingedge research and development to revolutionize plant breeding and biotechnology optimize supply chain operations and deliver the best customer experienceppThe successful candidate will use the latest innovations in deep learning and machine learning to propose software solutions to optimize supply chain operations The Data Scientist will design and test algorithms conduct prototyping to evaluate possible scenarios leveraging computational and statistical techniques for the development of novel approachesppRequired SkillspulliExperience You have a PhD or a Masters degree with optimally 4 years of academic or industrial experienceliliDeep learning amp Machine learning You are an expert in deep learning You have deep understanding of the theory modeling strategies limitations and pitfalls You are also familiar with other machine learning algorithmsliliProgramming You are proficient in Python or other high level programming language You are also capable of writing clean codeliliSoft skills You have a high sense of ownership and are motivated to deliver valuable analysis You have excellent communication skills and can clearly explain technical concepts to nonexpertsliulpDesired SkillspulliExperience working with agriculturalbiological scientific data is highly desiredliliDrive for translating business problems into research initiatives that deliver business valueliliCreativity in defining challenging exploratory projectsliulpLocation Creve Coeur MO or Remote from another location If local you will have to work onsite once the site reopens If you ae not local and apply to work remotely you should have prior remote experiencep
